title: Can't see chat
body: After the latest patch, i have not been able to see my team chat during team selection and group chat while my friends can see everything. I can still send messages and they can see it, but i cannot see anyones replies :( Is there a setting to fix this or is this a bug? Please help!!

replies.body:
Try this, this has happened to me to.

Close the League of Legends Launcher.
Change  the date to future 4 to 7 days ahead.
Re-open and should be working.
Close and change date to real date.
Open again and the problem should be resovled
What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
